SA14n1148:1: samudaye caturthakṣaṇākāraṃ pratipādayituṃ pratyātmavedyatvena kāṃścitkāmāvacarādīn devaputrān sākṣiṇaḥ kṛtvā kāṃścidāmantritavānityāha |
SA14n1148:31: "aṣṭame hi darśanamārgakṣaṇe prayojanaṃ bodhisattvasya pramāṇairitarathā hi navame kṣaṇe sattvadhātunirapekṣo nirodhe yatedi"ti |
SA14n1148:39: sa eva suparibhāvitatvāt sarvaśūnyatānāmadhigatārthatvena parītopadeśena śakta iti matiḥ |
SA14n1148:57: tatra tatrāraṇyādāvupasaṃkrāmato gacchataḥ tadeva caturbhirīryāpathaiḥ kathayannāha |
SA14n1148:69: rūpādernijarūpā prakṛtyeva śūnyatetyevaṃ sarvadharmālambane nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyata"iti |
SA14n1148:74: anena ca satyadvayasamāśrayeṇa sarvākārasattvārthapratipādanena samarthakāraṇanirdeśena prajñāpāramitodgrahaṇādīnāṃ buddhatvameva phalamāveditamiti grāhyam |
SA14n1148:76: "dharmadhātupariṇāmitakuśalamūlānāṃ phalaṃ tathāgatatvasya prāpaṇamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambe nirodhe dharmajñānamutpadyata"iti |
SA14n1148:85: mānuṣī vipadyatra prāṇināṃ vyāpāraḥ pratīyate vidyamāno'
SA14n1148:87: yato na karmaṇā vinā kiñcidapyasti phalaṃ yathā niṣpanne'
SA14n1148:97: imānanantaroktāniyato rakṣāvaraṇaguptisaṃkhyāvacchinnān dṛṣṭadhārmikān pratyutpannajanmasaṅgṛhītān guṇānanuśaṃsān pratilabhate prayogāvasthāyām |
SA14n1148:101: kiṃ punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ dānādyāḥ pañcapāramitāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavantīti vaktavye ṣaṭpāramitāvacanam |
SA14n1148:102: mukhyayā prajñāpāramitayā gauṇasvabhāvayā api prajñāpāramitāyāḥ saṃgrahādityabhiprāyeṇoktam |
SA14n1148:112: athavā yasmādādita eva bhaktihetutayā tāvatkalyāṇaṃ tasmāt sādhu śṛṇu |
SA14n1148:113: yataśca madhye puṣṭihetutvāt kalyāṇaṃ tata suṣṭhu śṛṇu |
SA14n1148:114: yena ca paryavasāne muktihetutayā kalyāṇaṃ tena yoniśo manasikuru |
SA14n1148:118: sūtrādidharmaṃ viruddhaṃ grahītavyaṃ vigrahītavyaṃ manasā tato vacasā viruddhaṃ vaditavyaṃ vivaditavyam |
SA14n1148:120: yadi vā vyañjanārthobhayavighāṭaghaṭanādvigrahītavyamityādipadatrayaṃ maṃsyanta ityasyānantaraṃ jinajananībhāvanābhirataṃ bodhisattvamārabhyetyadhyāhāryam |
SA14n1148:125: ata eva teṣāmabhiprāyā manorathā na paripūriṃ niṣpattiṃ gamiṣyanti |
SA14n1148:147: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarvopadravapraśamanatejobalatvaṃ pratipādya dṛṣṭāntenāpi samarthayannāha |
SA14n1148:168: nanu yatra prāṇakagandhena na nivartet tatra kathamoṣadhyā gandhena pratyudāvarteteti |
SA14n1148:172: sāṃvṛte'pi kāryakāraṇabhāve tasyā evauṣadhyāḥ sa tādṛśo bhaiṣajyaguṇo yastasyāśīviṣasya tadviṣamabhibhavati nānyasyetyevaṃ balavatī hi sā auṣadhī |
SA14n1148:179: yāni tānīti nipātasamudāyo yāni kānicidityarthe vartate |
SA14n1148:186: na vivardhiṣyanta iti yathākramaṃ śrutacintābhāvanākāle veditavyam |
SA14n1148:208: āpadvā tridhā svapratyayajāparā sattvasaṃkhyātapratyayajā parasattvasaṃkhyātapratyayajā ca |
SA14n1148:211: "prajñāpāramitodgrahaṇādipravṛttasya tathāgatādibhyaḥ sarvathā sarvarakṣāvaraṇaguptayo bhavantītyevaṃ prajñāpāramitayā sarvadharmālambane mārge dharmajñānamutpadyata"iti |
SA14n1148:214: ādeyavacaśceti kṛpayā svayaṃ prāṇātipātādiviratipūrvakaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitvā'
SA14n1148:220: "ātmanā ca prāṇātipātātprativirato bhaviṣyatītyārabhya yāvat - pareṣāṃ varṇavādī tatsamanujño bhaviṣyati"
SA14n1148:224: na ca krodhābhibhūto na ca mānābhibhūta iti |
SA14n1148:228: nanu pratipakṣaṃ vinā doṣāpagamābhāve kathaṃ tasyaivaṃ guṇodaya iti |
SA14n1148:232: sa ca tena bhāvita iti matiḥ |
SA14n1148:239: sattveṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣvāghāto vyāpādaḥ |
SA14n1148:243: "prajñāpāramitāparigrahabalādeva buddhatvābhilāṣiṇā svayaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādipūrvakaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitvā tatraiva pareṣāṃ sthāpanaṃ kāryamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane mārge'
SA14n1148:260: "dānādīnāmakṣayaṃ kartumicchatā samyaksambādhau pariṇāmanaṃ smṛtyādibalena kāryamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane mārge'
SA14n1148:262: yathoktairevākārairanyāpadeśanirdiṣṭaiḥ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇā samutpadyanta iti nātra vipratipattiḥ |
SA14n1148:278: yadyevaṃ tatrāpi pramuditādibhūmyabhidhāne bodhisattvānāṃ darśanādimārgasya pratipādanātkimarthaṃ punarupādānamiti cet |
SA14n1148:280: niḥśeṣahetuphalādhigamāpekṣayā tathāgatānāṃ sarvākārajñatetyabhidhānājjinaputrāṇāṃ tadukto mārgo na bhavatītyāśaṅkāvāraṇārtham |
SA14n1148:281: tata eva hetumātramapakṛṣya pṛthagjinātmajānāṃ darśanādimārgātmikā mārgajñatā vyavasthāpyate |
SA14n1148:285: kecidarthāntarābhisandhinā yathoktena granthaprabandhenākārārthamanuktvā darśanamārgaṣoḍaśakṣaṇopalakṣaṇameva kevalamanukṛtamiti varṇayantyevamuktānuktanirvedhabhāgīyādyarthapratipādanapareṣu grantheṣu draṣṭavyamiti |
SA14n1148:288: bhāvābhiniveśamūlo hi rāgādikleśagaṇastadvirudhaśca nairātmyābhyāsa ityatastaṃ vinā kathaṃ duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntyādiriti cet |
SA14n1148:289: naivaṃ,yasmādyathoditavidhinā nairātmyasaṃsūcanaparāḥ sarva evāmī ṣoḍaśākārāḥ sannihitavineyajanahitādhāracikīrṣayā tvevaṃ yathābhihitanānāprakārarūpeṇa nirdiṣṭāḥ santo'
SA14n1148:291: darśanamārgānantaraṃ bhāvanāmārgābhidhāne sati svalpavaktavyatvena phalanimnatvena ca vineyapravṛtterbhāvanāmārgasya kāritraṃ tāvatkathayannāha |
SA14n1148:306: avatarata ityādi padatrayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ madhyādhimātrādidvitīyatrikavipakṣasya madhyamṛdvādiprakārapratipakṣādhigamayogato vācyam |
SA14n1148:315: tenaiva cārthābhidhāne pūrvāśrutānāmevāvagītatā syāditi taddoṣaparihāreṇa pūrvakālaṃ vikṣiptānāṃ paścādāgatānāñca tadarthaśravaṇārtham |
SA14n1148:322: pareṣāñca tadvījādhānārthamiti paryāyadeśanānāmaṣṭau prayojanānyevaṃ sarvatra vācyam |
SA14n1148:341: saṃkṣiptamātre samāhitaṃ cittaṃ yogināṃ tadvistarārthe sarvatra kathaṃ samāhitaṃ syādityetadarthaṃ nirdeśadeśanā |
SA14n1148:342: tathā vistaramātre samāhitaṃ cittaṃ yogināṃ tatsaṃkṣiptārthe sarvatra kathaṃ samāhitaṃ syādityetadarthamuddeśadeśanetyāgamaḥ |
SA14n1148:346: nanu taddeśakṣepaṇāsāmarthyavatā puruṣeṇa kṣiptaṃ śastrādikamantarā virodhopanipātābhāve kathaṃ na śarīre nipatediti |
SA14n1148:350: māturabhyāsamānāyā evaṃ mahāvidyādisvabhāvāyāḥ sāmarthyenānantarā gurutvadharmavirodhopanipātānna taddehamanuprāpnoti śarādikamiti |
SA14n1148:380: tathā yogijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogābhyāsabalena yathaiva tadabhūdbhavati bhaviṣyati cātītaṃ vartamānamanāgataṃ vastupareṇa parikalpitaṃ,
SA14n1148:381: tathaivopadarśitavividhākāraprakāraprabhedaprapañcaṃ bahiriva parisphuradrūpaṃ sphuṭapratibhāsaṃ liṅgāgamānapekṣamavisaṃvāditayotpannaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiṣyate |
SA14n1148:382: ataścaivaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvatra sākṣāddarśitvābhyupagamādyanna prāptaṃ na vijñātaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ ,
SA14n1148:386: śraddhātiśayayogena puṇyamahatvādyatra sthāne tathāgatādīnāmadhigamo jātastatpūjyamiti bodhikāritrānantaraṃ prajñāpāramitādhāradeśapūjyatākāritraṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vaktumāha |
SA14n1148:405: nanu viheṭhādyutpattipratighāte sthānasya vyāpārābhāvātkathaṃ tatra viheṭhādi kartuṃ na śakṣyata iti tatkasya hetorityāśaṅkyāha |
SA14n1148:407: ayaṃ vākyārtho ye sarvasattvānāmarthāya mṛdumadhyādhimātravyāpādapratipakṣeṇa maitrīprabhedamabhayamavairamanutrāsaṃ svayaṃ satkṛtya nirantaraṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhāvayanti |
SA14n1148:409: teṣāṃ traikālikabuddhānāṃ tatrotpādena tatsthānaṃ viśiṣṭameva jātamato'
SA14n1148:410: cintyatvāddhetupratyayasāmagyā bhūbhāgamāhātmyātkāraṇaviguṇotpattyā viheṭhādikāryaṃ na śakyate tatra kartuṃ pratītyasamutpādadharmatābalāditi |
SA14n1148:418: piteva pitṛbhūta ityupamā vācakabhūtaśabdasyopādānādanyacaityasamānatvena caityabhūtaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśa ityeke |
SA14n1148:419: yatra hi nāma pudgalanairātmyadyotikayā ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā ityādigāthayādhiṣṭhito bhūbhāgaḥ stūpo matastatra samastavastunaiḥsvābhāvyaprakāśikāyā māturudgrahaṇādinopetaḥ stūpo nitarāmevetyataḥ |
SA14n1148:420: sākṣyeva sākṣibhūta iti tatsvabhāvatve caityameva caityabhuta iti candragomī |
SA14n1148:444: sāpi svārthā svaparārthā parārthā ceti mūlabhedena trividhā satī mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena pratyekaṃ bhedāt trikatribhirnavadhā bhavati |
SA14n1148:445: tadyathā mṛdvī madhyādhimātrā ca svārthādhimuktirevaṃ svaparārthādhimuktiḥ parārthādhimuktiśca |
SA14n1148:446: evameṣāpi navaprakārā mṛdumṛdvādiprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ bhidyamānā navabhistribhiradhimuktiḥ saptaviṃśatiprakārā bhavati |
SA14n1148:482: tadvacanenaiva mātuḥ pūjāyāmadhikaṃ puṇyamiti pratipādayituṃ śakraṃ pratipraśnayannāha |
SA14n1148:499: ātmabhāva eva śarīraṃ tasya vā śarīraṃ śilāputrakasyeva śarīramiti nyāyāt |
SA14n1148:500: tadeva pratilabhyata iti pratilambhastena tathāgata iti na saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
SA14n1148:526: tastaddyotikāyā mātuḥ pūjayā sarvajñajñānasya dharmakāyasya pūjanādvahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati |
SA14n1148:528: likhitvā pūjayato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ nirdiśya likhyamānāyāmapi tathaiva pratipādayannāha |
SA14n1148:545: na ca punaḥ śraddhāsyantīti karmaphalādau sampratipattivigamāt |
SA14n1148:551: dṛṣṭatattvasya śraddhā triṣu ratneṣvāryakāntañca śīlaṃ caturthamavetya prasāda ityanyaḥ |
SA14n1148:582: nanu samānābhiprāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ pravṛttau kathameko dvau vā'
SA14n1148:602: yasmāt pūrvaṃ bhagavān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣito'
SA14n1148:603: nupalambhayogena caryāniṣpādanārthaṃ tathā mayā sarvabuddhaguṇāvāptihetutvena prajñāpāramitā pratisartavyā |
SA14n1148:619: tatrāyamartho dhātugarbhastūpapūjātastasyāḥ sakāśānnidānaṃ buddhatvaprāpteḥ kāraṇaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavediti |
SA14n1148:623: tathāpyatra sāmānyena kuśalaṃ puṇyaṃ jñeyaṃ rūpadhātāvapyasyārthasya sambhavāt |
SA14n1148:641: dhimuktyā samprayuktā yā prajñā sāpi yathādhikatayātra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parimīmāṃsāṃ parīkṣāmāpadyeta kuryāt |
SA14n1148:648: bodhisattvānāñca jananīpustakasadbhāvenānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ śravaṇādilakṣaṇaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyena |
SA14n1148:649: yata iti śeṣa iti tasmāt sthāpayediti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
SA14n1148:650: na kevalaṃ sthāpayedapi tu yathoktenaivāśayena saṃskārādikaṃ kuryādityāha |
SA14n1148:660: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika koṭiśa ityādi |
SA14n1148:665: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśikāyaṃ jambūdvīpa ityādi |
SA14n1148:697: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpaka ityādinā |
SA14n1148:702: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ sāhasre cūḍika ityādi |
SA14n1148:706: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasra ityādi |
SA14n1148:710: akṣiptatāhaṃmānavāsanatvena prathamataḥ svārthādhimukternavaprakārān nirdiśyedānīṃ svaparārthādhimukteḥ prathamaṃ mṛdumṛduprakārārthamāha |
SA14n1148:716: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyāḥ dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ |
SA14n1148:735: nanu tathāgatasya sarvaprativiśiṣṭatve kathaṃ mātuḥ pūjāyāmadhikaṃ puṇyamiti |
SA14n1148:741: yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi yena prakāreṇa śrotṛjanāntarasya cittaṃ sāśaṅkamutpadyate tasya pūrvoktenāpi krameṇa niṣedhanaṃ kriyata eva |
SA14n1148:743: nyatroktamuttaraṃ codyañcaikasyāparasya tadeva codyamuttarañca na bhavatīti |
SA14n1148:755: yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāddravye śabdaniveśastadabhidhāne tvatalāvitivacanāt |
SA14n1148:765: mahānubhāvatvena kṣamādisampannaḥ śakra iti tasyāmantraṇaṃ mārṣeti devaputrāṇāṃ sādhūktatvena tadeva bhagavānāha |
SA14n1148:767: nanu sāṃdṛṣṭikaprayojanamantareṇa kimarthaṃ prajñāpāramitā gṛhyata iti kasyacidvitarka iti |
SA14n1148:788: pañcakaṣāyocchedakāle kliṣṭe ca lokadhātau śākyādhirājasya tattvādhigamahetutvāt saṃsārottāraṇārthena niruttarā |
SA14n1148:791: pi prajñopāyakauśalyena daśakuśalādikaṃ loke prabhāvayantīti kṛtvā samābhāvādasamā |
SA14n1148:793: yathoktameva vyākhyānaṃ yuktarūpamanyathā mahāvidyāditvaṃ yadbhagavatyāstat kasya hetorityāśaṅkyāha |
SA14n1148:796: tataśca yairmahāsurādiparājayamahārthasiddhiphalapradatvānmahāvidyeyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitetyādigranthaḥ prathamato vyākhyātastaiḥ prakaraṇārtho na lakṣita iti lakṣyate |
SA14n1148:797: mahāvidyāditvamanyatrānyathā vyākhyātamato yathoktavyākhyānaṃ granthānugatamapi na saṅgatamiti na mantavyam |
SA14n1148:808: tatra prathamadhyānaṃ vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ceti pañcāṅgam |
SA14n1148:809: dvitīyamadhyātmasamprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ceti caturaṅgam |
SA14n1148:810: tṛtīyamupekṣā smṛtiḥ samprajanyaṃ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ceti pañcāṅgam |
SA14n1148:811: caturthadhyānamupekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiraduḥkhāsukhā vedanā cittaikāgratā ceti caturaṅgam |
SA14n1148:814: prajñopāyaparigrahabalātsāśravāṇyeva bodheraṅgāni kāraṇāni samprayuktāni tulyaṃ pravṛttānītyapare varṇayanti |
SA14n1148:832: samāsena caturaśīte rāgādicaritānāmekaikacaritapratipakṣo yāvatā granthena parisamāpyate tāvān grantharāśirdharmaskandha iti caturaśīti dharmaskandhasahasrāṇi |
SA14n1148:853: oṣadhya eva vā kāścinniśi tārā ivāvabhāsamānāstathocyante |
SA14n1148:873: athavā śūnyatorūkaruṇe tajje ca karmaṇi naipuṇyam |
SA14n1148:880: iti vacanānna te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyantītyādivacanaṃ na punaruktamāśaṅkanīyam |
SA14n1148:881: tathāhi pūrvaṃ darśanamārgādhikāreṇoktamadhunā tu bhāvanāmārgādhikāreṇeti viśeṣaḥ |
SA14n1148:887: ko hi nāma dhātūpasarganipātānāṃ niyatamarthaṃ nirdeṣṭuṃ kṣama iti vacanāt |
SA14n1148:896: rājādayaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātādyupastambhena taṃjinajananyabhiyuktaṃ muditaṃ kartavyaṃ maṃsyante |
SA14n1148:914: "anyatra maitryādyabhiyuktasya hi bodhisattvasya sarve devamanuṣyāḥ suprasannā bhavantī"tyādi |
SA14n1148:920: sarīsṛpāḥ sarpāstatpradhānaṃ kāntāraṃ durgasthānaṃ tanmadhyaṃ gatāḥ prāptāḥ |
SA14n1148:931: bhagavadanujñāyaiva teṣāṃ viheṭhanācittāni jñātvā nivartanārthaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śakraḥ pravartitavāniti jñeyam |
SA14n1148:937: yenaiva dvāreṇa kāṣṭhādisaṃskṛtena mārgeṇa ca viśiṣṭabhūpradeśenāgatāstenaiva gatā ityarthaḥ |
SA14n1148:946: eṣāṃ pratinivṛttyarthaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pravartayetyanujñātamabhyanujñānaṃ śakrasya kṛtam |
SA14n1148:953: nyatamasyaikasyāpi saddharmaśravaṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ śubhakarma na samanupaśyāmyato nānugrahaṃ karomi |
SA14n1148:984: dhikāro niyogaḥ śravaṇādisvabhāvo yeṣāṃ te tathā |
SA14n1148:992: tathāgatāḥ parivārapradānena taduktaśravaṇena ca pūjādibhiśca paryupāsitā yaiste tathoktāḥ |
SA14n1148:995: nanu tathāgataparyupāsanādinā mātuḥ śravaṇāderagṛhītasambaddhatvātkathaṃ tena tasyānumānamiti |
SA14n1148:999: ata eva tato gaveṣitavyā kāraṇamantareṇa kāryāsambhavāt |
SA14n1148:1004: tasmānmātuḥ śravaṇādikaṃ niyamena vāsanāparipuṣṭibījadhānatayā tathāgatapadaprāpakaṃ bhavati |
SA14n1148:1005: taccedamīdṛśaṃ śravaṇādikaṃ kvacitkādācitkatayā viśiṣṭakāraṇāya ca janmakaṃ svakāraṇaṃ viśiṣṭameva tathāgataparyupāsanādikamanumāpayati |
SA14n1148:1027: ṣaḍeva pāramitā buddhatve kāraṇaṃ tat kathamekasyāḥ prādhānyanirdeśa iti |
SA14n1148:1030: yasmāt trimaṇḍalaviśuddhyā dānādīnāṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmenādau pravṛttatvāt pūrvaṅgamāḥ tasmāttadvarṇaṃ bhāṣe nāmadheyañca parikīrtayāmīti |
SA14n1148:1036: tathābhūtapradānasya phalopabhogena kṣayānna prakarṣagamanamiti praśnādeva gṛhītārthaḥ |
SA14n1148:1041: vyatirekamukhenaivaṃ prajñāparigrahabalāddānādīnāṃ pāramitārūpatāṃ nirdiśya prajñāyāḥ pāramitāsvabhāvaṃ pratipādayitumāha |
SA14n1148:1052: yathoktanyāyena dānādīnāmantargamāt prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parikīrtitāyāṃ ṣaṭpāramitākīrtanānnaikasyā eva jinajananyā nirdeśa ityarthaḥ |
SA14n1148:1063: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarve guṇā iti samastāyā māturamī sarve guṇā na bhavanti |
SA14n1148:1067: bhagavato'ntikādasyā yaḥ pradeśo mayodgṛhītaḥ sa cānantaramevānyatīrthādinirākṛtau pravartitastasyāmī guṇā ityarthaḥ |
SA14n1148:1070: kintu tāvanmātrapradeśātmikāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ yaḥ kevalamudgrahīṣyatyeva yāvat kevalaṃ svādhyāsyatyeva na tasyaiva kevalamamī guṇā bhaviṣyantyapi tu yo'
SA14n1148:1071: pi likhitvā pūjāpūrvakaṃ pustakamātraṃ dhārayettasyāpyanantaraguṇān vadāmītyāha |
SA14n1148:1076: likhitvā viśiṣṭodgrahaṇādikāriṇaḥ kaḥ sandeho yadahaṃ rakṣādikaṃ kariṣyāmītyarthaḥ |
SA14n1148:1077: tathaiva sādhu sādhu kauśiketi sādhukāraṃ dattvā pañcamaṃ madhyamadhyaṃ vaktumāha |
SA14n1148:1086: mā kaścin māṃ vihaṭhenābhiprāyaḥ paryanuyuñjīta codyaṃ kurvītetyevamavalīnacittatā na bhaviṣyati |
SA14n1148:1087: nanu sambhavatprajñādiprakarṣatve puṃsāṃ cetoguṇāparijñāne kathamevaṃ na bhavatīti |
SA14n1148:1133: tatrāprahīṇakāmarāgānuśayāḥ kāmadhātujāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ prahīṇakāmarāgānuśayā rūparāgābhiniviṣṭā rūpadhātujā rūpāvacarāḥ |
SA14n1148:1152: mahāntaṃ raśmyālokaṃ tatra gṛhādāvavagacchati paśyatīti yāvat |
SA14n1148:1164: prītireva saumanasyaṃ tajjātaṃ yeṣāmiti te tathoktāḥ |
SA14n1148:1178: pūrvaṃ sāmānyena sarvatra śucicaukṣasamudācāratāṃ nirdiśya viśeṣeṇa tātparyārthamāha |
SA14n1148:1193: kāye yadbalaṃ vāci yattejo matau yā'
SA14n1148:1196: yā tu kāyaśrutiḥ sā mukhye kāye kāyāśrite ca vacasi matau ca guṇakalpanayā veditavyā |
SA14n1148:1203: nanu yogācārasya dhyānāhāratvānna kavaḍīkāhāre balavatī gṛddhirasya tu likhitvā mātaraṃ pūjāpūrvakaṃ sthāpayataḥ |
SA14n1148:1213: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṅgamaṃ sthāpayetpūjayennodgṛhīyādityādi |
SA14n1148:1221: asya prajñāpāramitādhikāre kaḥ prasaṅga iti na vaktavyam |
SA14n1148:1224: apanītāvaguṇṭhanikādinā nīcāsanasthena vikṣepadoṣaṃ parihṛtya mokṣakāmāśayena saddharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ |
SA14n1148:1226: asyārthasya prathamata eva svārthādhimuktihārakaprārambhe kathitatvāt kimarthamupādānamiti na mantavyam |
SA14n1148:1227: yatastatra svārthaparasya sthāpanamuktamatra tu parārthaparasyeti viśeṣaḥ |
